com.threerings.gwt.util
Class SimpleDataModel<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.threerings.gwt.util.SimpleDataModel<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataModel<T>
public class SimpleDataModel<T>
extends Object
implements DataModel<T>

A data model that is implements DataModel with a List of items.

          Returns a data model that contains only items that match the supplied predicate.

          Returns the first item that matches the supplied predicate or null if no items in this model matches the predicate.

          Returns the total number of items in this model.

getItemCount

public int getItemCount()
Description copied from interface: DataModel
Returns the total number of items in this model. It is OK if this returns zero until after the first call to DataModel.doFetchRows(int, int, com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.AsyncCallback>) is called back. You may also return -1 to indicate that this model does not supply a row count, and the pager should continue offering pages for as long as the underlying service is able to satisfy the requests.

Specified by:
getItemCount in interface DataModel<T>

doFetchRows

public void doFetchRows(int start,
                        int count,
                        AsyncCallback<List<T>> callback)
Description copied from interface: DataModel
Perform a paged data request for the given number of items at the given offset into the result set. The result is returned through the given callback.

Specified by:
doFetchRows in interface DataModel<T>

removeItem

public void removeItem(T item)
Description copied from interface: DataModel
Called when we wish to remove an item from our locally cached data.
